title: Migratory Birds
description: Explore the amazing journeys of birds that travel thousands of miles across continents each year.

questions.question: Which bird holds the record for the longest migration, flying from Arctic to Antarctic and back?
The V-formation used by migrating geese helps the flock do what?
Monarch butterflies migrate, but which bird is famous for migrating to Capistrano, California each spring?
How do many migratory birds navigate during their journeys?
options: Using Earth's magnetic field, stars, and the sun

questions.question: The ruby-throated hummingbird migrates across which body of water nonstop?
Which large bird migrates from Europe to Africa and was historically believed to bring babies?
The bar-tailed godwit holds the record for the longest nonstop flight of about how many miles?
What season do most birds in the Northern Hemisphere migrate south?
Which migratory bird is famous for its annual return to the wetlands of Bosque del Apache in New Mexico?
The European cuckoo is known for migrating to Africa but also for what unusual behavior?
options: Laying eggs in other birds' nests

questions.question: What term describes birds that do NOT migrate and stay in one area year-round?
Which North American warbler migrates from Canada to South America, a journey of over 3,000 miles?
What is the primary reason birds migrate?
options: To follow food sources and suitable breeding conditions

questions.question: The whooping crane, one of North America's rarest birds, migrates between Texas and which Canadian province?
